official_title: To prohibit the sale for export of unprocessed timber from Federal lands west of the 100th meridian in the contiguous 48 States.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretaries of the Interior and of Agriculture from selling unprocessed timber from Federal lands west of the 100th Meridian in the contiguous 48 States which will be exported or be used as a substitute for timber from private lands which is exported by the purchaser. Sets forth a specified exception.

titles.title: To prohibit the sale for export of unprocessed timber from Federal lands west of the 100th meridian in the contiguous 48 States.
